ai-patthana14.12:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.12:1.1_1: or based on dealing with anyone else. Nor is the cause of reasoning conditions for the sake of these two conditions.
ai-patthana14.12:1.1_2: because of non-greed, they don’t perceive deceit, and because of their conditions.
ai-patthana14.12:2.1_0: or only one who understands the Dhamma for a long time.
ai-patthana14.12:3.1_0: Or they haven’t understood the teaching for themselves, or for someone who understands not. These are the three conditions for the sake of direct knowledge, for the sake of non-percipient. ...
ai-patthana14.12:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.12:5.1_0: The thighs on the inside, is finished.
